description:
In this meetup we will have Cátia Oliveira who is an UI/Ux consultant with a large experience designing complex systems that support the telco business and Maria Inês who is an trainee exploring User Centered Design approaches. They will be talking about Design Thinking.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/cátia-oliveira-5483ab15/
https://www.linkedin.com/in/maria-inês-amador-de-almeida-606ba9142

ABSTRACT

In this Meetup we will talk about Design Thinking.
A methodology that focuses on the user, the people, and the creative way of thinking "out of the box."
A dynamic and collaborative workshop that will lead you to explore new ideas and practical ways to solve problems and find solutions.
How to be innovative and think like a designer?
Come and discover with us in our Meetup - Design Thinking.

Agenda:

• 18h45 - Welcome
• 19h00 - Talk “Design Thinking”, by Cátia Oliveira and Maria Inês
• 20h00 - Coffee Break & Networking
• 20h15 - Open Space Discussions
• 21h00 - Final notes
location: Go Contact, Parque de Ciência e Inovação, Via do Conhecimento - 3830-352 Ílhavo
name: Aveiro Meetup #13 : Design Thinking Workshop
